ygData.msgSnippet: Not to toot my own horn but i run a site dedicated to Trade skills.  The sites current addy is: http://www.geocities.com/ResearchTriangle/System/3274/ .  The
ygData.messageBody:
Not to toot my own horn but i run a site dedicated to Trade skills. The sites current addy is: http://www.geocities.com/ResearchTriangle/System/3274/ . The site is simply has the information from the game put on the web. Im making guides on each skill i do but i started a new character and so i have to restart my training. If you can supply some info for my site i would greatly appreciante it. I'll be moving my site to a real host. Namely www.eqshack.com

hope my site will help you all out in the trade skill end of the game.

Nafertina lvl 8 [Tunare]
